SELECT s.stu_id AS studentPk, s.name AS name, s.gender AS gender, s.birth AS birth, s.phone AS phone, p.nm AS parentName, p.phone AS parentPhone, s.parents_id AS parentsPk, MAX(sc.class_id) AS classId, t.nm AS teacherName, s.pic AS pic FROM student s LEFT JOIN parents p ON s.parents_id = p.parents_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sc1.class_id AS class_id , sc1.stu_id FROM student_classes sc1 INNER JOIN student sc2 ON sc1.stu_id = sc2.stu_id ORDER BY sc1.class_id DESC ) sc ON s.stu_id = sc.stu_id LEFT JOIN class c ON sc.class_id = c.class_id LEFT JOIN teacher t ON c.tea_id = t.tea_id WHERE s.parents_id = #{parentsPk} GROUP BY s.stu_id, s.name, s.gender, s.birth, s.phone, p.nm, p.phone, s.parents_id ORDER BY s.name, s.birth, sc.class_id DESC ;
